TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to create the correct MIP data for all the operational elements (defined by IDT Schema Documentation > IESUnits.xsd > TargetingUnit, as an example Unit, it might be any other) and the Consumers are able to correctly understand (and display) it. This case is focused on the Unit's HostilityStatusCode element when it is missing.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Producer creates message elements for Unit with at least all its mandatory Elements. The HostilityStatusCode element must be missing. The Consumers receive the data and process them.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created the 'Ground Picture > Forces' topic. The Consumers have subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the unit is created and all attributes are processed and interpreted correctly on all Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction:
The Producer creates an example of Unit with missing HostilityStatusCode and with name XXX_MH_050 and fills ALL mandatory elements with valid values.
Notices: XXX in name of the object is meant (in principle) to be replaced by the 3 letter code of the country name. Example for the name of the unit: ITA_MH_050
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers receive and process (and display) the example Unit and all elements that the Producer created.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The Producer creates an update for the object by changing (creating) its HostilityStatusCode element, keeping the former values for the rest of elements.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers receive and process the example Unit and all elements that the Producer updated.
